typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulementwithIndex
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_avoir as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoirwithIndex
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stgOffre
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> referentielATC
source(output(
		{Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixMoyen
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
RenameLeft derive(ca_final = toDouble(ca_ecoulement),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_ecc),
		data_origin = "ecoulement",
		id_canal_final = 42) ~> caFinal
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = columnChoiceEcoulement@yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameLeft
fullLeft filter(isNull(renameAvoir@indexcols2)) ~> outerLeft
ecoulementwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoiceEcoulement
avoirwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameAvoir
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerAvoir
innerAvoir derive(canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP", 
    iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = renameAvoir@yearmonth,
		year = {Année},
		month = Mois) ~> canal
canal derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45, 
    iif(canal=="FS", 51, 
    iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		ca_final = toDouble(qte_avoir)*toDouble(ca_avoir),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_avoir)) ~> idCanal
idCanal derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", 'Diffus'),
		data_origin = "ecoulement retraité") ~> idCanalFinal
stgOffre select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre = Offre,
		{ATC Performance} = CodeATC,
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(NoOffre,
		{ATC Performance}),
	Canal = max(Canal)) ~> uniqueOffre
idCanalFinal, uniqueOffre join(renameAvoir@NoOffre == uniqueOffre@NoOffre,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftOffre
dropColumns select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndInner
caFinal, EndInner union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> canalFinal
referentielATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> atcKeepingColumn
DerivedColumn4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> atcNotNull
atcNotNull aggregate(groupBy(code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		Marque),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> uniqueATC
select112 derive(qt_cd_e = toInteger(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		qt_livr_e = toInteger(qt_livr_e),
		qt_factur_e = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		ca_livr_ = toDouble(ca_livr_),
		ca_factur_ = toDouble(ca_factur_),
		tempDist = iif(lower(WholeSalerID)=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'dsc')>0, 'dsc',     iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort', 	iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',lower(WholeSalerID))))))) ~> typeCaste
fullLeftOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2 = columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		canal = canal@canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC Performance},
		NoOffre = renameAvoir@NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
window1 derive(tempOrigin = "facturation",
		{Canal distribution} = 42,
		{Qté facturée} = iif(toFloat({Qté facturée})> 0 , 1 , -1)) ~> DerivedColumn2
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'right',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAvoir
JoinAvoir filter(isNull(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2)) ~> FilterIndexCols2
FilterIndexCols2 select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth = renameAvoir@yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoice
EndUniqueATC filter(code_postal_atc=="3300") ~> Filter8
atcKeepingColumn derive(code_postal_atc = toInteger(code_postal_atc)) ~> DerivedColumn4
prixMoyen derive({Période} = iif(length({Période})>1,{Période},"0"+{Période})) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoicePrix
canalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> prepareGetPeriode
typeCaste, columnChoicePrix join(replace(lower(tempDist), " ", "") == replace(lower(Distributeur), " ", "")
	&& toInteger(year) == toInteger(annee2)
	&& toInteger({Mois calendrier}) == toInteger(month)
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(select112@article, " ", ""))),replace(select112@article, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(columnChoicePrix@Article, " ", ""))),replace(columnChoicePrix@Article, " ", "")),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
join2 derive({Période} = coalesce( {Période}, "00" )) ~> fillNaPeriodeFact
prepareGetPeriode, columnChoicePrix join(replace(lower( iif(prepareGetPeriode@distributeur=="MABILLE", "sonac", prepareGetPeriode@distributeur) ), " ", "") == replace(lower(columnChoicePrix@Distributeur), " ", "")
	&& toInteger(year) == toInteger(annee2)
	&& toInteger(prepareGetPeriode@month) == toInteger(columnChoicePrix@month)
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", "")),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join3
select108 derive({Période} = coalesce( {Période}, "00" ),
		toroll = mapLoop(abs(toInteger( qt_final )), #index)) ~> derivedColumn200
window2 derive(indexcol2 = year+"-"+{Période}+"-"+HubSAPid+"-"+ref2+"-"+toString(indexcol2)) ~> CreateIndexColEcoul
DerivedColumn2 derive(indexcol2 = year+"-"+{Période}+"-"+HubSAPid+"-"+ref2+"-"+toString(indexcol2)) ~> CreateIndexColFact
CreateIndexColEcoul, EndFact join(indexcol2 == f_Indexcol2,
	joinType:'outer',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join4
CreateIndexColFact select(mapColumn(
		{f_Org commerciale} = {Org commerciale},
		{f_Canal distribution} = {Canal distribution},
		{f_Secteur d'activité} = {Secteur d'activité},
		{f_Document de vente} = {Document de vente},
		f_Poste = Poste,
		{f_Jour calendaire} = {Jour calendaire},
		{f_Agence commerciale corrigé} = {Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{f_ATC Corrigé} = {ATC Corrigé},
		{f_Donneur d'ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		{f_recept de march} = {recept de march},
		{f_Destinataire facture} = {Destinataire facture},
		{f_type doc vente} = {type doc vente},
		{f_Type de poste} = {Type de poste},
		f_Livraison = Livraison,
		{f_Type de livraison} = {Type de livraison},
		{f_Type poste Livraison} = {Type poste Livraison},
		f_Facture = Facture,
		{f_Type de facture} = {Type de facture},
		{f_Type poste Facture} = {Type poste Facture},
		{f_Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{f_Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{f_Qté cdée} = {Qté cdée},
		{f_CA cdé} = {CA cdé},
		{f_Qté livrée} = {Qté livrée},
		{f_CA livré} = {CA livré},
		{f_Qté facturée} = {Qté facturée},
		{f_CA facturé} = {CA facturé},
		{f_Cout standard cdé} = {Cout standard cdé},
		{f_Cout fabrication} = {Cout fabrication},
		{f_Cout standard livré} = {Cout standard livré},
		{f_Cout standard facturé} = {Cout standard facturé},
		f_date_id = date_id,
		f_year = year,
		f_yearmonth = yearmonth,
		f_year_month = year_month,
		f_reference = reference,
		f_article = flatten1@article,
		f_WholeSalerID = WholeSalerID,
		f_WholeSalerHubID = WholeSalerHubID,
		f_HubName = HubName,
		f_HubSAPid = HubSAPid,
		f_tempDist = tempDist,
		f_Article = flatten1@Article,
		f_Distributeur = Distributeur,
		{f_Période} = {Période},
		f_annee2 = annee2,
		f_month = month,
		f_ref2 = ref2,
		f_tempOrigin = tempOrigin,
		f_Indexcol2 = indexcol2,
		f_article = flatten1@article
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndFact
join4 split(!isNull(data_origin) && !isNull(f_tempOrigin),
	!isNull(data_origin) && isNull(f_tempOrigin),
	disjoint: false) ~> split1@(EcoulementMatche, EcoulementNonMatch, FacturationSansMatching)
split1@EcoulementNonMatch select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select104
split1@FacturationSansMatching select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = {f_Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution} = {f_Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité} = {f_Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente} = {f_Document de vente},
		Poste = f_Poste,
		{Jour calendaire} = {f_Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} = {f_Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé} = {f_ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre} = {f_Donneur d'ordre},
		{recept de march} = {f_recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture} = {f_Destinataire facture},
		{type doc vente} = {f_type doc vente},
		{Type de poste} = {f_Type de poste},
		Livraison = f_Livraison,
		{Type de livraison} = {f_Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison} = {f_Type poste Livraison},
		Facture = f_Facture,
		{Type de facture} = {f_Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture} = {f_Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier} = {f_Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile} = {f_Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée} = {f_Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé} = {f_CA facturé},
		date_id = f_date_id,
		year = f_year,
		yearmonth = f_yearmonth,
		reference = f_reference,
		article = split1@FacturationSansMatching@f_article,
		WholeSalerID = f_WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID = f_WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName = f_HubName,
		HubSAPid = f_HubSAPid,
		Article,
		Distributeur = f_Distributeur,
		{Période} = {f_Période},
		annee2 = f_annee2,
		month = f_month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select105
split1@EcoulementMatche split(data_origin == "ecoulement retraité",
	disjoint: false) ~> split3@(EcoulementRetraiteMatche, EcoulementMatch)
split3@EcoulementRetraiteMatche select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		{Org commerciale} = {f_Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution} = {f_Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité} = {f_Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente} = {f_Document de vente},
		Poste = f_Poste,
		{Jour calendaire} = {f_Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} = {f_Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé} = {f_ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre} = {f_Donneur d'ordre},
		{recept de march} = {f_recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture} = {f_Destinataire facture},
		{type doc vente} = {f_type doc vente},
		{Type de poste} = {f_Type de poste},
		Livraison = f_Livraison,
		{Type de livraison} = {f_Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison} = {f_Type poste Livraison},
		Facture = f_Facture,
		{Type de facture} = {f_Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture} = {f_Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier} = {f_Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile} = {f_Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée} = {f_Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé} = {f_CA facturé},
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EcoulementRetraiteMatche
EcoulementRetraiteMatche derive(origine_de_la_ligne = "Ecoulement Retraité - Matché",

		PossAMid = POSSAMidString,
		reference = {Ref fournisseur},

	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> decrementationAnuel@(output1)
yearmonthNOTNULL derive(month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		origin = "ecoulement") ~> ExtractYearAndMonth
ExtractYearAndMonth filter(not({Qté Mois A}=='0')) ~> FiltreQteMois
ExtractYearAndMonth filter({Qté Mois A}=='0') ~> FiltreQteMoisANull
FiltreQteMois filter({Ref fournisseur}!='') ~> FiltreRefFournisseur
FiltreRefFournisseur derive({Qté Mois A} = toDouble({Qté Mois A}),
		{Société} = iif(replace({Société}, " ", "") == replace("MABILLE - C.S.I.    ", " ", ""),"MABILLE" , {Société} )) ~> caEcoulementAndAgenceClient
caEcoulementAndAgenceClient filter({Agence du client} != '') ~> FiltreAgenceClient
OrganisationMabilleSonac filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> FiltrePOSid
FiltrePOSid aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		UnitID),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID),
		Commentaire = max(Commentaire)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
FiltreAgenceClient, uniqueOrganisation join(replace({Agence du client}," ","") == replace(POSid," ","")
	&& replace({Société}," ","") == replace(UnitID," ",""),
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
select1, uniqueOrganisation join(replace({Agence du client}," ","") == replace(POSid," ","")
	&& replace({Société}," ","") == replace(UnitID," ",""),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOuterOrganisation
innerOrganisation, endVenteDirect join(ExtractYearAndMonth@year == select2@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, endVenteDirect join(ExtractYearAndMonth@year == select2@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Société} as string,
		{Dépot} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Code GTAC} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Valeur as string,
		{Quantité n-1} as string,
		{Valeur n-1} as string,
		{CP Dépôt} as string,
		Dummy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'fname',
	wildcardPaths:['Ecoulement/Maillard/*.csv']) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Agence (Code)} as string,
		{CP Agence} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
select1 filter(!isNull({Quantité})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble(qte_ecoulement),
		year = trim(year, " "),
		Article = trim(reference, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(year,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity
window1, typeCaste join(getYear@Year == typeCaste@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(year = toString(year),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
yearmonthSplit, typeCaste join(getYear@Year == typeCaste@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@year) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(ecart = runingQte-{Qté ventes directes},
		signe = iif(toDouble(runingQte)-toDouble({Qté ventes directes}) <=0 , 0, 1)) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
derivedColumn1, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(marque_file = iif(toInteger(BrandID)==1604, "saunier", "vaillant"),
		{Société} = upper({Société})) ~> marqueFile
marqueFile select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {Société},
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité},
		ca_ecoulement = Valeur,
		{Code postal} = {CP Dépôt},
		year = fullLeftUnion@Year,
		month = Month,
		yearmonth = Yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		marque_file,
		agence_code = {Dépot}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
innerOrganisation derive(Yearmonth = replace(Yearmonth, " ", "")) ~> yearmonthSplit
yearmonthSplit window(over(Year,
		POSSAMid,
		{Référence}),
	asc(Mois, true),
	runingQte = sum({Quantité})) ~> window1
select2 select(mapColumn(
		{Société},
		{Dépot},
		Mois,
		{Code GTAC},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		{Quantité},
		Valeur,
		{Quantité n-1},
		{Valeur n-1},
		{CP Dépôt},
		fname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
MapDrifted2 select(mapColumn(
		{Société} = Societe,
		{Dépot} = Dept,
		Mois,
		{Code GTAC},
		{Référence} = Reference,
		{Désignation},
		{Quantité} = Qte,
		Valeur,
		{Quantité n-1},
		{Valeur n-1},
		{CP Dépôt},
		Dummy,
		fname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
ecoulement derive(Societe = toString(byName('SociÃ©tÃ©')),
		Dept = toString(byName('DÃ©pot')),
		Reference = toString(byName('RÃ©fÃ©rence')),
		Designation = toString(byName('DÃ©signation')),
		Qte = toShort(byName('QuantitÃ©'))) ~> MapDrifted2
enleverVentesDirectes window(over(getYear@Year,
		{Référence},
		POSSAMid),
	asc(Mois, true),
	signe_cumul = sum(signe)) ~> window2
window2 derive({Quantité} = iif( signe_cumul <1,0, iif (signe_cumul ==1 , toInteger(ecart), toInteger( {Quantité})   ) )) ~> derivedColumn1
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,

		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MAILLARDECOULPREPARED
outerleftOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	input(

AllFacturation derive(year = toString(year({Jour calendaire})),
		yearmonth = iif(month({Jour calendaire})<10, toString(year({Jour calendaire}))+"0"+toString(month({Jour calendaire})), toString(year({Jour calendaire}))+toString(month({Jour calendaire}))),
		date_id = toString({Jour calendaire}, "dd-MM-yyyy"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc
FactFilterc derive(qt_cd_e = {Qté cdée},
		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},
		qt_livr_e = {Qté livrée},
		ca_livr_ = {CA livré},
		qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},
		ca_factur_ = {CA facturé},
		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')> 0  ||instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')> 0) ~> filtreDSC

	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerDSC
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')== 0  &&  instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')== 0) ~> filtreOtherPlateforme
renameColumns, filtreOtherPlateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,

SelectQuantity unpivot(output(
		columnName as string,
		qt_final as string
	),
	ungroupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> quantityToLine
keepColumns select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},

SelectCA unpivot(output(
		columnName as string,
		ca_final as string
	),
	ungroupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},

		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> CAtoLine
quantityToLine derive(Mois = toInteger(split(columnName, " ")[3]),
		qt_final = toDouble(qt_final)) ~> getQuantityMonth
CAtoLine derive(Mois = toInteger(split(columnName, " ")[3]),
		ca_final = toDouble(ca_final)) ~> getCAMonth
getQuantityMonth, getCAMonth join(quantityToLine@{Num Org} == CAtoLine@{Num Org}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num DR} == CAtoLine@{Num DR}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num ATC} == CAtoLine@{Num ATC}
	&& quantityToLine@{Canal Dist} == CAtoLine@{Canal Dist}
	&& quantityToLine@{Nom Canal} == CAtoLine@{Nom Canal}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 1}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 2}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 3}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 4}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 5}
	&& getQuantityMonth@Mois == getCAMonth@Mois
	&& quantityToLine@{Qté Obj An} == CAtoLine@{Qté Obj An}
	&& quantityToLine@{CA Obj An} == CAtoLine@{CA Obj An},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinQuantityAndCA
objectif derive({Art Niv 1} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 1}), " ", {Art Niv 1}),
		{Art Niv 2} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 2}), " ", {Art Niv 2}),
		{Art Niv 3} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 3}), " ", {Art Niv 3}),
		{Art Niv 4} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 4}), " ", {Art Niv 4}),
		{Art Niv 5} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 5}), " ", {Art Niv 5})) ~> changeNULL
joinQuantityAndCA select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org} = quantityToLine@{Num Org},
		{Num DR} = quantityToLine@{Num DR},
		{Num ATC} = quantityToLine@{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist} = quantityToLine@{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal} = quantityToLine@{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An} = quantityToLine@{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An} = quantityToLine@{CA Obj An},
		qt_final,
		Mois = getQuantityMonth@Mois,
		ca_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteRightColumn
deleteRightColumn derive({Num Org} = toInteger({Num Org}),
		{Canal Dist} = toInteger({Canal Dist}),
		{Nom Canal} = replace(lower({Nom Canal}), " ", ""),
		{Art Niv 1} = replace({Art Niv 1}, " ", ""),
		{Art Niv 2} = replace({Art Niv 2}, " ", ""),
		{CA Obj An} = toDouble(replace({CA Obj An}, ",", "."))) ~> dataCleansing
dataCleansing sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PREPARATION_OBJECTIF_RH.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		Article as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixmoyen
splitDuree derive(mois1 = toInteger(split( {Mois début}, "/")[1]),
		annee1 = split( {Mois début}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> splitAnneeMois
splitAnneeMois derive(toreplicate = iif (mois2 - mois1 <=0, 1 ,  mois2 - mois1+1)) ~> createArray
prixmoyen derive({Mois début} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[1],
		{Mois fin} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[2],
		WholeSalerID = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> splitDuree
createArray derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index )) ~> createLoop
createLoop foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Distributeur,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn5
Select1 derive(month = dd+mois1) ~> month
